short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pixels Guru Companion, the ultimate assistant for Pixels Online players.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pixels Guru Companion is the ultimate Pixels game assistant, featuring powerful features not available in any other extension, including:

* Automated crafting timers - automatically tracks all your crafting activities.  Never lose a resource again.
* Taskboard Earnings Dashboard tracking costs, earnings and experience per day, week and month
* Automated storage management - will automatically populate and update all your storage chests with no manual input
* Automatic inventory management and tracking
* Automatic task board tracking - will automatically search your inventory and storage for ingredients
* Marketplace price tracking - including regular and UGC items
* Industry finder - specify an industry type and tier and Pixels Guru will automatically locate lands with available resources

---
